head.title: Reliance Bank in White Plains Given Poor Rating by Agency

hedline.hl1: Reliance Bank in White Plains Given Poor Rating by Agency

abstract.p: Weiss Ratings Agency ranks Reliance Bank in White Plains, NY, as state's weakest bank (S)

block.p: A report by Weiss Ratings Agency ranks Reliance Bank in White Plains as the state's weakest bank. The agency gave Reliance an E-, with E denoting ''very weak,'' indicating a risk to depositors or creditors. The rating was based on an analysis of quarterly financial statements. Philip E. Zegarelli, president of Reliance, said: ''The report is way off. We're doing very well, so well that in 1999 we underestimated our state franchise tax.'' He also said the bank expects an infusion of $4.25 million next month from Avant Financial of Syracuse, which will become majority owner.
